body: As long as you're in contact with earth or unworked stone, you can expend one use of mythic power as a standard action to draw energy from the earth and radiate it outward, granting yourself and allies within 30 feet DR 10/adamantine for 1 minute.
name: Earth Protection
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Guardian/Guardian Features/3rd-Tier Guardian Path Abilities/Earth Protection
